title: Baki Gaiden - Retsu Kaiou wa Isekai Tensei Shitemo Ikkou ni Kamawan
description:
After the events of Baki-Dou, the famous Kenpo master Retsu Kaioh wakes up in a new world unknown to him.
___
**Note:** This is the official entry, not to be confused with the Doujinshi from Twitter user @sakuramankiti.

altTitles.ja: バキ外伝 烈海王は異世界転生しても一向にかまわんッッ

altTitles.en: Baki Side Story: Retsu Kaioh Doesn't Mind Even If It's in Another World
Baki Side Story: Retsu Kaioh Doesn't Mind If He is Reincarnated in Another World

altTitles.zh: 刃牙外传 烈海王对于转生异世界一向是无所谓的
